amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule titled "Fluid Mineral Leases and Leasing Process".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
